## What is Data Quality?

Data that is fit for intended use.

## Quality Dimensions

| Dimension | Definition |
|-----------|------------|
| Accuracy | Correct values |
| Completeness | No missing data |
| Consistency | Same across systems |
| Timeliness | Up to date |
